ROM.Changelog: Changes in this build [04 June 2018] * [Fixed] Crashes in customisations. * [Improved] Settings Theme. * [New] Android P Styled StatusBar Icons. * [Toggle] Added Android P animations. * [Toggle] Added 3 finger screenshot gesture. * [Toggle] Added Pocket mode. * [Toggle] Added Accidental touch protection. * [Toggle] Per app Sensor Block. * [Toggle] Added One tap toggle in quick settings. * Some more under the hood changes.
